attributes.action: Ban caged hens and halal meat.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to do this because they have a duty of care to all in sociality that does not just include humans but also other animals too. The government does not allow for humans to hurt other humans just for the sake of it or because of religious reasons therefore since these animals are also sentient beings the government should not aloud these blatant acts of cruel on helpless animals.
attributes.background: Stop the horrible use/abuse of animals, when there is no necessary reason. There is no need for keeping hens in cages and  religious values/beliefs do NOT and should NOT, justify blatant animal abuse

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300257

Cages or close confinement systems where there is clear scientific evidence that they are detrimental to animal health and welfare are already banned. You could therefore start a petition calling for all livestock cages or close confinement systems to be banned, if that's something you'd like to happen.
